content:
I don't have direct access to information about upcoming performance art events. however, i would suggest checking out some of the major museums, galleries, and cultural institutions in your area to see what performance art events they have planned.

you can also search for upcoming art festivals or events dedicated specifically to performance art, which may feature a range of artists and performances from around the world.

another option is to follow the social media accounts or websites of some of the performance artists i listed earlier, as they may announce upcoming shows or events on their pages.

with the ongoing covid-19 pandemic, many art institutions have shifted to offering virtual exhibitions and performances, so you may also find some digital options to explore from the comfort of your own home.
